WorkItem.Description:
I've implemented a new feature in the latest version of PHPExcel: support for ShrinkToFit alignment option in cells. This allows a big text to fit in a small cell by dinamically adjusting the size of the font. 
Â 
It works for both XLSX and XLS (BIFF8) files. I'm attaching a zip files with the original and the altered files (4+demo). Hopefully this can be included in the main distribution.
